title: Import/Export Data
lede: Import and export contact, lead, and account data in various formats.

sections.title: Data Import
sections.content:
Import data from external sources and CRM systems.

Import Features:

  • CSV Import: Upload spreadsheet data
  • Field Mapping: Map columns to CRM fields
  • Validation: Data quality checks before import
  • Duplicate Handling: Skip or merge duplicate records

sections.title: Data Export
sections.content:
Export your CRM data for backup or integration purposes.

  • Format Options: CSV, Excel, JSON export formats
  • Selective Export: Choose specific fields and records
  • Filtered Export: Export based on search criteria
  • Scheduled Exports: Automatic recurring exports

metaTitle: Import/Export Data - Bulk Data Operations | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Import and export CRM data in bulk. Support for CSV, Excel, and API-based data synchronization.
metaKeywords: data import, data export, CSV import, bulk operations, data migration, CRM sync, data transfer
